subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Willy Taveras and the Cincinnati Reds have agreed to a two-year contract, filling the team’s need for a center fielder and a leadoff hitter. He batted .251 last season with the Colorado Rockies, leading the major leagues with 68 stolen bases.
